message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.DB, cs.SI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with entity aspect recommendation, which is a task in semantic search. This task involves recommending the most relevant aspects of an entity, taking into account time to improve search experience. The paper proposes a novel event-centric ensemble ranking method that learns from multiple time and type-dependent models and dynamically trades off salience and recency characteristics. This task involves techniques from information retrieval (IR), natural language processing (NLP), and machine learning (ML), which are covered by the sub-categories cs.IR, cs.CL, and cs.LG. The paper also deals with data management and storage, which is covered by the sub-category cs.DB. Finally, the paper involves techniques for handling temporal data, which is covered by the sub-category cs.SI.
